text: Floscopa mannii is a species of plant in the family Commelinaceae. It is native to Cameroon and Nigeria. It grows in swampy forest habitat. It is known from very few collections.Cheek, M. 2004. Floscopa mannii. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2004: Downloaded on 09 September 2015. ==References== Category:Floscopa Category:Endangered plants Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
